column5: We go fishing in Canada every spring. We go up by a place called "Marty's Bear Den" There are several lakes in the area. We always go to a chain of three lakes, and the fishing is either hot or dead. Any suggestions or help on where to go would be appreciated.
have no idea where this is.could you give the real name or a location?

[font size="1" color="#FF0000"]LAST EDITED ON Apr-03-00 AT 11:00AM (CST)[/font][p]I think the name of the lake is Robinson,it's like three lakes that are conected and i think a nearby lake is named BIG winabage?
